00025 class user {
00026         var $db;
00027 
00028         var $allOptions;        
00029         var $ID;
00030         var $login;
00031         var $email;

00039         function user ($db, $allOptions) {
00040                 $this->db = $db;
00041                 if (! isError ($allOptions)) {
00042                         $this->allOptions = $allOptions; 
00043                 } else {
00044                         return $allOptions;
00045                 }
00046                 $this->initEmpty ();
00047         }
00048         
00049         /*Public initters*/
00050         
00057         function initFromDatabaseID ($ID) {
00058                 $sql = "SELECT * FROM {$this->db->getPrefix ()}users WHERE userID='$ID'";
00059                 $q = $this->db->query ($sql);
00060                 if (! isError ($q)) {
00061                         $row = $this->db->fetchArray ($q);
00062                         $this->initFromArray ($row);
00063                         $this->ID = $row['userID'];
00064                 } else {
00065                         return $q;
00066                 }
00067         }
00068         
00069         function initFromDatabaseLogin () {
00070         }
00071         
00072         function initFromDatabaseEmail () {
00073         }
00074         
00081         function initFromArray ($array) {
00082                 $this->initEmpty ();
00083                 foreach ($array as $key => $value) {
00084                         $this->setOption ($key, $value); // No error
00085                 }
00086                 $this->login = $array['login'];
00087                 $this->email = $array['email'];
00088         }
00089         
00090         /*Public functions*/
00091         
00098         function addToDatabase () {
00099                 if (! $this->isInDatabase ()) {
00100                         $sql = "INSERT into {$this->db->getPrefix ()}users (login, email,";
00101                         foreach ($this->getAllOptions () as $key => $value) {
00102                                 $sql .= "$key,";
00103                         }
00104                         $sql[strlen ($sql)-1] = ')'; // remove latest , with )
00105                         
00106                         $sql .= ' VALUES(';
00107                         $sql .= "'{$this->getLogin ()}', '{$this->getEmail ()}',";
00108                         foreach ($this->getAllOptions () as $key => $value) {
00109                                 $sql .= "'$value',";
00110                         }
00111                         $sql[strlen ($sql)-1] = ')'; // remove latest , with )                  
00112                         $q = $this->db->query ($sql);
00113                         if (! isError ($q)) {
00114                                 $this->ID = $this->db->latestInsertID ($q);
00115                         } else {
00116                                 return $q;
00117                         }
00118                 } else {
00119                         return "ERROR_USER_ALREADY_IN_DATABASE";
00120                 }
00121         }
00122         
00129         function removeFromDatabase () {
00130                 if ($this->isInDatabase ()) {
00131                         $sql = "DELETE FROM {$this->db->getPrefix ()}users WHERE userID='{$this->getID ()}'";
00132                         $q = $this->db->query ($sql);
00133                         if (isError ($q)) {
00134                                 return $q;
00135                         }
00136                         $this->ID = -1;
00137                 } else {
00138                         return "ERROR_USER_NOT_IN_DATABASE";
00139                 }
00140         }

00146         }

00149         }

00152         }

00154         function getLogin () { return $this->login; }
00155         function getEmail () { return $this->email; }
00156         function getID () { return $this->ID; }
00157         function getAllGroups () {}
00158         
00166         function getOption ($name) {
00167                 if (array_key_exists ($name, $this->getAllOptions ())) {
00168                         return $this->allOptions[$name];
00169                 } else {
00170                         return "ERROR_USER_OPTION_DOES_NOT_EXISTS $name";
00171                 }
00172         }
00173         
00174         /*Private functions*/   
00181         function getAllOptions () {
00182                 return $this->allOptions;
00183         }
00184         
00193         function setOption ($name, $value) {
00194                 if (array_key_exists ($name, $this->getAllOptions ())) {
00195                         $this->allOptions[$name] = $value;
00196                 } else {
00197                         return "ERROR_USER_OPTION_DOES_NOT_EXISTS $name";
00198                 }
00199         }
00200         
00207         function isInDatabase () {
00208                 if ($this->getID () < 0) {
00209                         return false;
00210                 } else {
00211                         return true;
00212                 }
00213         }
00214         
00215         /*Private initters*/
00221         function initEmpty () {
00222                 foreach ($this->getAllOptions () as $key => $value) {
00223                         $this->allOptions[$key] = 'NOT SET';
00224                 }
00225                 $this->ID = -1;
00226                 $this->login = 'NOT SET';
00227                 $this->email = 'NOT SET';
00228         }
00229 }
